long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Syft is a CV screener that puts you in control. Powered by OpenAI, it saves you time, money, and effort by automagically finding you the best quality candidates in seconds.

Not only can Syft save you time and money, but it will also help you to reduce any early biases you have in your hiring processes.

If you want to find the best candidates, cheaper and quicker than ever before - give Syft a try!

March 2024 update - we have added in Candidate Summaries! With this update you are provided with a candidate summary that tells you exactly how the candidate is matched against the job description, as well as a list of soft skills!

New for April - pushed out some qualify of life features that allow you to filter by stage, state, and now multiple locations!
